name: Sun and Moon
text: Choose one of the following effects: ● Send 1 "Sun Dragon Inti" you control to the Graveyard, and play 1 "Moon Dragon Quilla" from your Graveyard. ● Send 1 "Moon Dragon Quilla" you control to the Graveyard, and play 1 "Sun Dragon Inti" from your Graveyard. This Skill can only be used once per Duel.
